channel.title: Comments for page "Dirty Shovel"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Dirty Shovel"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: 3 and 4 seems like equal and they are right ^_^ Use Pinchy Claw for BIGGER chance :D

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Which of the following 3 is it?:
1. 20% to get 1 rare ingredient in addition to normal found ingredients
2. 20% to replace one of the normal ingredients you pull with rare ingredient.
3. 20% for each ingredient you pull to be rare instead of normal
EDIT:
I am told it is actually
4. 20% for entire hunt to be treated as if in lunar overclocking
